hero.summary: I build modern, high-performance web applications. Passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, and exceptional UX. Always looking for the next technical challenge.
about.p1: I’m a technology-passionate developer with 2 years of experience building and optimizing web applications for complex industrial environments using Angular and .NET Core.
about.p2: I’ve worked on systems focused on performance, maintainability, and UX. I enjoy continuous learning and applying best practices: modular architecture, state management, and clean code.
about.p3: When I’m not coding, you’ll find me exploring open-source projects and experimenting with new tools. I believe the best solutions come from combining creativity with technical rigor.
about.cleanCode.title: Clean Code Advocate
about.cleanCode.desc: SOLID principles, design patterns, and code that reads like a story.
about.performance.title: Performance First
about.performance.desc: I optimize down to the last millisecond. Lazy loading, caching, query tuning, bundle optimization.
about.problemSolver.title: Problem Solver
about.problemSolver.desc: I enjoy breaking down complex problems into elegant and scalable solutions.
skills.subtitle: My main stack focuses on the Angular + .NET Core ecosystem.
exp.subtitle: 2 years of experience building and optimizing web systems for complex industrial environments, focused on performance and maintainability.

bullets: Architected and began implementation of the front-end structure, prioritizing code stability, scalability, and a solid foundation for future features.
Engaged with stakeholders in project kick-off meetings to analyze the current application flow and define requirements for the next version, focusing on user experience and process optimization.

exp.1.resp.title: Technical Assistance Scheduler App
bullets: Led development of an internal IT team availability tracker used during holiday periods, guided junior devs on reactive forms and Angular best practices, implemented dynamic forms for admins to create date ranges, developed calendar UI for users to submit daily availability, designed API endpoints with role-based access

exp.1.resp.title: Manufacturing Execution System (MES) Optimization
bullets: Reduced API response times by 25% through implementing efficient EF Core queries with .AsNoTracking() and proper indexing and improved Angular code quality by introducing standalone components for better maintainability,implementing modular architecture

exp.1.resp.title: Internal Task Management Platform
bullets: Replaced legacy service-based architecture with NgRx state management, improving task transition speed by 30%, optimized performance by implementing selectors to minimize store computations, reducing re-renders by 40% viaOnPush change detection

exp.2.resp.title: Technical Drawings Management System
bullets: Built a secure document management application for 100+ steel plant warehouse technicians, reduced drawing retrieval time by 65% through .NET Core API caching of frequently accessed drawings and optimized SQL Server queries with proper indexing

portfolio.subtitle: A selection of projects I’ve worked on — from enterprise applications to open-source contributions.
project.0.title: SYNTX
project.0.desc: SYNTX brings AI directly into the developer workflow: a smart code editor with AI autocomplete, context-aware chat that understands your codebase, a local LLM trained from scratch (no external AI APIs), optional web-augmented reasoning, and a sandboxed Docker runtime — all inside a project-based workspace with persistent conversations.
project.0.feature.0: Smart code editor with AI autocomplete (ghost text + Tab accept)
project.0.feature.1: Context-aware AI chat that understands your codebase
project.0.feature.2: Local LLM trained from scratch (no external AI APIs)
project.0.feature.3: Optional web-augmented reasoning for up-to-date answers
project.1.title: Web Portfolio
project.1.desc: A responsive, modern web portfolio built with Angular and Tailwind CSS, showcasing my experience, skills, and projects.
project.1.feature.0: Built with Angular and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive design
project.1.feature.1: Dynamic theming with light/dark mode toggle
project.1.feature.2: Internationalization (i18n) support for English and Romanian languages
project.1.feature.3: Showcases experience, skills, and projects with a clean, user-friendly interface
edu.subtitle: Continuous learning through formal education, online courses, and hands-on projects.
